title: Got Rawwr! emote permanent from hextech chest but it isn't showing up
body: I checked my collection and my hextech unlocks area and couldn't find it anywhere.

replies.body: In my experience, emotes tend to take some time before they appear (have seen/heard others experience a similar issue, not sure why it happens). I'd recommend just keeping an eye on the emote tab in your collection and see if they appear. If they still haven't appeared tomorrow, it might be a good idea to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (you'd probably want the "I am having technical issues." option, or the "Pool Party issue - Map accents, missions, rewards, etc." if it's a Pool Party event issue).
Ok, thanks. It did come in now.
